body.name: BIC White-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape, 39.3 Feet, 4-Count Pack of white Correction Tape, Fast, Clean and Easy to Use Tear-Resistant Tape

features: One 4-count pack of BIC White-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape, a tear-resistant, film-based correction tape with a tape dispenser offering maximum comfort and control
Instantly write or type your corrections with this white correction tape, which requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip
Clear correction tape dispenser lets you see exactly how much tape remains and the self-winding wheel lets you rewind the tape if it becomes loose
Each tape dispenser contains 39.3 feet of white correction tape to offer a long-lasting option for school or office supplies
Suitable for righties and lefties, these BIC White-Out Brand tapes offer a wide variety of use amongst students and employees for their documents and assignments

If your dispenser becomes loose, please DO NOT TAKE THE DISPENSER APART. Try these steps instead: 1. Press the nose of the dispenser firmly on paper, 2. While applying pressure, make a slow movement to the right, 3. Repeat until the tape rewinds
The perfect stocking stuffer this holiday season!
body.description: Product Description Make fast, easy and precise corrections on even the toughest errors with BIC White-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape. This tear-resistant, film-based BIC White-Out Brand Correction Tape comes in a tape dispenser that offers maximum comfort and control, so you can easily and accurately correct mistakes. The tear resistance offers tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last. The White-Out Brand tape requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip, so you can instantly write or type your corrections over it. A translucent body lets you see exactly how much BIC correction tape remains and a self-winding wheel lets you easily rewind the correction tape should it become loose. One pack contains four tape dispensers, each containing 39.3 feet of white correction tape. If you’re looking for reliable office or school supplies for lefties and righties, look no further than this white correction tape. From America’s No. 1 correction brand*, choose BIC White-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape for a high-quality, safe and affordable product you can trust. *Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service and Commercial Tracking Service, U.S., based on actual unit sales; 12ME June 2022 combined. From the Manufacturer BIC Wite-Out Correction Tape - 4pk

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 58,054 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Strong Correction Tape from America's #1 Correction Brand* Instant, Tidy Corrections BIC Wite-Out Brand correction tape applies dry, allowing you to quickly fix mistakes without the mess or waiting time of a correction fluid. Offering greater strength than paper-based tape, this film-based tape is more tear resistant to create tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last. Easy to Apply Dispensing the tape is easy: simply position the tip flat on the area to be corrected, press down firmly, and gently move from left to right. If tape becomes loose, press tip of tape firmly on paper, make slow motion towards the right, and repeat until tape rewinds. Translucent Dispenser The translucent dispenser allows you to see at a glance how much tape is remaining. You can apply the tape in a controlled, comfortable fashion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars super helpful as someone who likes to write in pen
reviews.reviewText: my experience comes from using this product on computer/ lined paper with papermate inkjoy pens.picture indicates an example of how I utilize them in my notes, highlighting the covering of mistakes, color*, and smearing**pros- good price for product recieved- I do most all of my college work in pen, and having this out in case I make a mistake has kept my papers neat, organized, and scribble free- really easy to use, does exactly what I need it for- so much better than liquid whiteout, it's controlled and doesn't have a drying timecons- difficult to use for left handed people- somewhat off white*; this doesn't bother me personally but note it doesn't always seamlessly blend in- I find that if I use highlighter over it, whatever writing in pen I put on top of that eventually smears into a blob**

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, no more liquid white out!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always been a person who likes to cover up written mistakes with white out, keeping my notes, calendars, address books etc., neat and organized. But liquid white out was annoying to use. Took too long to dry, rarely went on smoothly, too messy if you didn’t let it dry enough, and became thick and lumpy after a while. I don’t know what took me so long to search on Amazon for a different kind of white out, but I finally did. And wow, what a difference! I feel like I’ve been living in the Dark Ages, using something that was popular when typewriters were still being used!!I love this product. Fast, easy, smooth, it’s perfect for a neatnik like myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I use these heavily. Looking for dependability, smooth operation and WITHOUT the ribbon tangling or breaking. Cheaper models tend to tangle easy and break. These, while a little more expensive, don’t tangle and break as easy and appear to last longer. Value packs like these, give a better value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the stuff. I work at a hospital where I’m writing down lot of things on paper with a pen, using this allows me to correct any mistakes quickly and easily. It’s pretty easy to write over top of it too. Well worth money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok but not the best
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked to discover that the ones from Staples worked way better, as I expect a lot from Bic. They get the job done, but only if you're using them on a flat horizontal surface; I tried to use them on a wall calendar and couldn't get the full line, kept "breaking" and then the strip would get clogged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In the past I ordered a generic brand and it was terrible. Yes, you got more units, but they got tangled up and had to throw them away. Stay with this smooth and reliable product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm a creature of habit and have always used correction tape dispensers that you hold vertically when using. These are used "sideways". They work good and I'll get used to it. Maybe I'm just experiencing the "old dog new trick" syndrome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smooth, easily applied and dries quickly. Really happy with it and will buy again.
J'ai reçu ma commande 2 jours à l'avance et en parfaite condition. Facile d'utilisation. Utile autant à la maison qu'au travail.
They work very well. No mess.
Tape slid off roll and had to throw out one of the 4 in the package. Could not be repaired.
Best value for the money, excellent product! 5 stars
